title: Zane the Zombie
description: This Unofficial Minecraft Book Is Over 4,000 Words and Has 25 Pictures to Accompany the Story  Read this Minecraft book FREE as part of your Amazon Prime or Kindle Unlimited membership Check out the diary of Zane. He is a zombie that doesn't quite fit in with all the other zombies. Along the way, he finds some new friends and learns the value of friendship. Pick up your copy and start reading this Minecraft diary today.This book was recently removed from the listings, but now it is back. Disclaimer: This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights.
